overview: Bendito Machine is a series of simple-minded organisms and their dazed relation with machines. Gentle creatures that survive in a state of perpetual dependence, where artifacts mark the passage of a glorious future. Everything you need is the spark of life, obey his commands, fuel the machines, pull the trigger and carry onâ€¦
tagline: 6 short tales about charming vertebrate creatures and their holy machines.
title: Bendito Machine Saga
